# ConstraintDomains

[![JuliaConstraints](https://img.shields.io/badge/site-Julia_Constraints-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://JuliaConstraints.github.io/dev/)
[![ConstraintDomains](https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-ConstraintDomains.jl-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://juliaconstraints.github.io/dev/constraints/constraint_commons)
[![Build Status](https://github.com/JuliaConstraints/ConstraintDomains.jl/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/JuliaConstraints/ConstraintDomains.jl/actions)

**ConstraintDomains.jl** stands as a critical package within the **Julia Constraints** ecosystem, focusing on the definition and manipulation of variable domains that underpin the search spaces of constraint programming problems. This package provides the infrastructure necessary for specifying both discrete and continuous domains, thereby enabling a broad range of constraint programming applications.

## Issues and Contributions

We encourage opening issues and discussing contributions to this package on the [Julia Constraints](https://github.com/JuliaConstraints/JuliaConstraints.github.io) website repository.
